
#SETDSTFILE("out/romfiles/data/script/stage01.bin")


#SETSIZE(224, 3)

#STARTMSG(0x9FA, 15)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 0
//=======================================

// はぁ…はぁ…[wait]
*Haa...haa...*
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xA11, 23)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 1
//=======================================

// や…やっと着いた……[wait]
F...finally made it...
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xA34, 34)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 2
//=======================================

// エクソシスト総本部……[br]
// 黒の教団[wait]
The Exorcist Headquarters... The Black Order.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xA77, 29)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 3
//=======================================

// #cyなんだい、この子は？#wh[wait]
#cyWho's the kid?!#wh
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xA9C, 37)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 4
//=======================================

// #cyダメだよ、部外者入れちゃあ〜#wh[wait]
#cyWe don't admit outsiders~#wh
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xAD0, 23)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 5
//=======================================

// #cyあ、コムイ室長#wh[wait]
#cyAh, Chief Komui...#wh
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xAEF, 50)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 6
//=======================================

// #cyそれが微妙に部外者っぽく[br]
// ねーんスよね……#wh[wait]
#cyJudging from the look of him, it doesn't seem like he accidentally wandered here...#wh
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xB29, 15)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 7
//=======================================

// すいませーん[wait]
Excuse me--!
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xB40, 60)

// auto-generated string 8
//=======================================

// クロス・マリアン元帥の紹介で[br]
// 来た、アレン・ウォーカーです[wait]
I was referred here by General Cross Marian. My name is Allen Walker.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xB84, 46)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 9
//=======================================

// 教団の幹部の方にお目にかかり[br]
// たいのですが…[wait]
I'd like to request an audience with the head of the Order...
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

// auto-generated string 10

// 室長、何か聞いてます？#wh[wait]

Hey Chief, do you know anything about this?#wh
[wait]

#STARTMSG(0x1D82, 67)

//=======================================

That's right. If Innocence is {white}, they are {black}.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xA789, 77)

// auto-generated string 656

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 750
//=======================================

// 丈夫そうな柱がある[wait]
This column appears to be rather sturdy.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

This column appears to be rather sturdy.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

// auto-generated string 752

#ENDMSG()

// auto-generated string 753

// 下の画面の調べたい所を[br]
// タッチして下さい
Touch the spot you'd like to examine on the screen below.

#ENDMSG()

#ENDMSG()
